text: The 2017 Africa Cup of Nations (also called AFCON 2017 and CAN 2017) was the 31st edition of the Africa Cup of Nations tournament. The tournament hosted by Gabon. It was held from 14 January to 5 February 2017. The winner of this tournament qualified for the 2017 FIFA Confederations Cup tournament in Russia. == Teams == The draw for the qualification stage took place on 8 April 2015. The following teams have qualified for the final tournament. * (Group J winners) * (Group D winners) * (Group M winners) * DR Congo (Group B winners) * (Group G winners) * (hosts) * (Group H winners) * (Group E winners) * (Group I winners) * (Group C winners or runners-up) * (Group F winners) * (Group K winners) * (Group A runners-up) * (Group A winners) * (Group D runners-up) * (Group L winners)
